message: Let's start with a simple split. I take $6000, you get $4000. It's a fair deal considering I'm offering first.
I think a 55/45 split is a more fair starting point.  It's a little closer to an even split and recognizes the value of my time in negotiating.
While I appreciate the sentiment, Bob, waiting until the next round when I propose again will cost us both more than that difference. Let's find something we both agree on now.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle.  I'll take the slightly smaller portion this time to avoid inflation eating into our gains further.
